text: (Maranitta) avarkal annalil (camatikaliliruntu) velippattu(t tankal iraivanin) mun vantu nirparkal. Avarkal ceyta oru visayamum allahvukku maraintu vitatu. (Avarkalai nokki,) inraiya tinam, â€˜â€˜evarutaiya atci? (Enru kettu, anaivaraiyum) atakki alum oruvanakiya anta allahvukkuriyate!'' (Enru patil kurappatum)
